briefTitle: Treatment of Diabetes in Patients With Systolic Heart Failure
officialTitle: A Randomized Active-Control Double-Blinded Study to Evaluate the Treatment of Diabetes in Patients With Systolic Heart Failure

protocolDocument.label: Study Protocol, Statistical Analysis Plan, and Informed Consent Form

primary.measure: Change From Baseline Aerobic Exercise Capacity at 12 Weeks
primary.description: Peak oxygen consumption (VO2) measured by maximal cardiopulmonary exercise test

primary.measure: Change From Baseline Ventilatory Efficiency at 12 Weeks
primary.description: Minute ventilation (VE) relative to CO2 production (VCO2) slope measured by cardiopulmonary exercise test
